description: Manage threat intelligence indicator with sentinel.

commands.name: az sentinel threat-indicator append-tag
commands.summary: Append tags to a threat intelligence indicator.

commands.name: az sentinel threat-indicator create
commands.summary: Create a new threat intelligence indicator.
commands.syntax:
az sentinel threat-indicator create --resource-group
                                    --workspace-name
                                    [--confidence]
                                    [--created]
                                    [--created-by-ref]
                                    [--defanged {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--description]
                                    [--display-name]
                                    [--etag]
                                    [--external-id]
                                    [--external-references]
                                    [--external-updated-time]
                                    [--granular-markings]
                                    [--indicator-types]
                                    [--kill-chain-phases]
                                    [--labels]
                                    [--language]
                                    [--last-updated-time]
                                    [--modified]
                                    [--object-marking-refs]
                                    [--parsed-pattern]
                                    [--pattern]
                                    [--pattern-type]
                                    [--pattern-version]
                                    [--revoked {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--source]
                                    [--threat-tags]
                                    [--threat-types]
                                    [--valid-from]
                                    [--valid-until]

commands.name: az sentinel threat-indicator query
commands.summary: Query threat intelligence indicators as per filtering criteria.
commands.syntax:
az sentinel threat-indicator query --resource-group
                                   --workspace-name
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--include-disabled {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--keywords]
                                   [--max-confidence]
                                   [--max-valid-until]
                                   [--min-confidence]
                                   [--min-valid-until]
                                   [--page-size]
                                   [--pattern-types]
                                   [--skip-token]
                                   [--sort-by]
                                   [--sources]
                                   [--threat-types]

commands.name: az sentinel threat-indicator replace-tag
commands.summary: Replace tags added to a threat intelligence indicator.
commands.syntax:
az sentinel threat-indicator replace-tag --name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --workspace-name
                                         [--confidence]
                                         [--created]
                                         [--created-by-ref]
                                         [--defanged {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--description]
                                         [--display-name]
                                         [--etag]
                                         [--external-id]
                                         [--external-references]
                                         [--external-updated-time]
                                         [--granular-markings]
                                         [--indicator-types]
                                         [--intelligence-tags]
                                         [--kill-chain-phases]
                                         [--labels]
                                         [--language]
                                         [--last-updated-time]
                                         [--modified]
                                         [--object-marking-refs]
                                         [--parsed-pattern]
                                         [--pattern]
                                         [--pattern-type]
                                         [--pattern-version]
                                         [--revoked {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--source]
                                         [--threat-types]
                                         [--valid-from]
                                         [--valid-until]

commands.name: az sentinel threat-indicator show
commands.summary: View a threat intelligence indicator by name.

commands.name: az sentinel threat-indicator update
commands.syntax:
az sentinel threat-indicator update [--confidence]
                                    [--created]
                                    [--created-by-ref]
                                    [--defanged {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--description]
                                    [--display-name]
                                    [--etag]
                                    [--external-id]
                                    [--external-references]
                                    [--external-updated-time]
                                    [--granular-markings]
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--indicator-types]
                                    [--kill-chain-phases]
                                    [--labels]
                                    [--language]
                                    [--last-updated-time]
                                    [--modified]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--object-marking-refs]
                                    [--parsed-pattern]
                                    [--pattern]
                                    [--pattern-type]
                                    [--pattern-version]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--revoked {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--source]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--threat-tags]
                                    [--threat-types]
                                    [--valid-from]
                                    [--valid-until]
                                    [--workspace-name]
